summary: I am a software engineer with a strong background in computer software engineering.

projects.description: Developed an AI-powered ATS system utilizing transformer LLMs and NLP engineering to revolutionize candidate search, empowering recruiters with effortless skill-based queries and achieving unmatched parsing accuracy for wise hiring decisions.

Engineered an innovative ML model leveraging VGG-16 and BERT algorithms to develop text embeddings and map image similarities between Shopify products across multiple businesses imitating cross-selling.

Developed and implemented advanced web scraping strategies for Zepto, Pharmeasy, and Coursera, leveraging cutting-edge parser technologies to overcome captcha, rate limits, and bot detectors for enhanced data extraction.

responsibilities: Optimized Vue.js frontend app through efficient component utilization and advanced state management techniques, achieving 25% faster page load time, 15% enhanced user engagement, and a significant 30% reduction in bundle size.

Designed robust MySQL schema and efficient FastAPI backend APIs, ensuring data integrity, scalability, and high-performance retrieval. Implemented advanced indexing and query optimization, achieving 40% faster queries.
Implemented unit and end-to-end tests using Jest for 85% coverage, ensuring reliable releases. Conducted A/B tests, resulting in 10% user acquisition increase and 5% churn decrease.

Designed and organized analytics endpoints for Web3 UI elements using Amplitude, capturing critical metrics on user engagement, retention, and conversion. Implemented data-driven strategies resulting in a 30% increase in user engagement and a 25% improvement in conversion rates. Leveraged FastAPI for API development and used Amazon S3 and Apache Kafka, to ensure efficient data analysis and retrieval.

Leveraged ML algorithms to conduct a comprehensive analysis of heatmaps and user behavior data, using Amazon Redshift to implement a scalable data storage solution. Streamlined the CI/CD pipeline using Apache Airflow, resulting in improved UX decisions that led to a 35% reduction in user drop-off rate within 3 months.

Led the development of the AI infrastructure, using CNNs and GANs, to convert garment sketches into highly accurate 3D models. Accelerated rendering through C++, CUDA, and Docker, resulting in a 40% reduction in processing time.
Pioneered an innovative fashion Metaverse project with Blender and OpenGL, enabling immersive virtual shopping experiences. Achieved a 30% increase in user engagement and 95% satisfaction metrics.

Implemented CI/CD pipelines using Apache Airflow for continuous deployment on Shopify. Perfected the MLOps framework streamlining the development processes and reducing system downtime by 20% using Kubernetes.
